attributes.action: Please Raise China's Human Rights Issue During Your Visit to Beijing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are writing as Members of European and UK Parliaments，representatives of Chinese NGOs and some individual citizens around the world listed below and requesting you to raise human rights issue to the leaders of the Communist China during your visit to Beijing. We would be very grateful if you could also visit any of the victims listed below or their family members

The current human rights situation has deteriorated in Mainland China. Where China is moving toward is becoming crucial to the global scene, as the world is starting to share a common lot as people in Mainland China.

McMilland-Scott,Guihua Li, Lucy Jin, Ze Xia, SHAO Jiang,Jean Lambert, Claude MORAES and other 81 people

rejection.details: You should ask the 81+ signatories to sign online individually. Their vote does not count if simply referred to in your text.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
